text: Ronald Reed GaretGaret's Resume (born March 17, 1951 in Los Angeles County, California)California Birth Index is an American religion law scholar, currently the Carolyn Craig Franklin Chair in Law and Religion at USC Gould School of Law. He graduated from Harvard University, magna cum laude, received his PhD in religious studies from Yale University, and his JD from USC Gould. He is a member of Phi Beta Kappa. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:University of Southern California faculty Category:American lawyers Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Yale University alumni Category:USC Gould School of Law alumni Category:American legal scholars
title: Ronald Garet
